article.title: DARPA Descopes Vulture Program
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) has notified The Boeing Company, St. Louis, Missouri, of a -$13,660,799 modification to another transaction agreement (OTA). The goal of the Vulture Program was to design, develop, and manufacture a flight demonstrator. The program and its implementing OTA are being descoped to include those elements of the statement of work that can be accomplished with the funds remaining that are of interest to both the Government and Boeing subsystems in photovoltaics and energy storage systems. DARPA is the contracting activity.
